attributes.description: Welcome to Cuphead Takeover Week! Alfredo "Al-cup-o" Diaz and Michael "Mug-chael" Jones are ready to tackle all of Cuphead (the video game) just in time for the release of Cuphead (the Cuphead Show television tele-show). attributes.description: Alfredo and Trevor are back for more spooks in Friday Night at Freddy’s: Security Breach! You're in for a treat with this one. It’s real toasty. Plus, we get a visit from the Baba Yaga throughout all of this scary chaos. How grand!

attributes.caption: BK and Alfredo dive in the hilariously insane world of High on Life, as they fight with sentient weapons with crass senses of humor to avoid getting turned into drugs by the dangerous G3 Cartel and become the greatest and funniest bounty hunter in the galaxy.

attributes.title: Playing the NEW Wave 3 Maps! - Let's Play Mario Kart 8
attributes.caption: Mario Kart 8 just released it's next batch of maps and we're here to give them a whirl. Ky, Lindsay, Michael, Matt, and BK are joined by a very special guest, Blizzb3ar from Squad Team Force where we check out the 8 new tracks as well as testing out the new Custom Items feature! You thought regular Mario Kart got chaotic? Wait until it's just Blue Shells and Bloopers.

attributes.title: We Become Criminals in Thief Simulator VR!
attributes.caption: We’re back in VR! This week, Trevor, BK, and Alfredo break and enter in Thief Simulator VR. Maybe if playing video games doesn’t work out, the gang could give full time crime a try.

attributes.title: How To Lose Your Souls in 60 Seconds | My First Dark Souls Game #6
attributes.caption: Majin Joe has been through quite a lot. He has been defeated by men with sticks, crabs, and a boss with sacks. He keeps losing souls by the thousands. Will Majin Joe ever not lose his souls? That seems very unlikely.

attributes.title: The Return of Al-cup-o and Mug-chael | Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course Part 1
attributes.caption: Once upon a time, our heroes Alfredo "Al-cup-o" Diaz and Michael "Mug-chael" Jones beat the entirety of Cuphead in the most stress-inducing, raging week of their lives. Now, with the release of Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course, they make their triumphant return and begin to tackle the DLC bosses! Surely the skills gained months ago have stayed, and they will breeze through every boss, first try!
